landing.tagline:
Find work that fits you, with AI.
Smart, personal and surprising.
landing.description:
For everyone who thinks: "What do I really want with my work?"
Whether you're just starting, stuck, looking for something new, or just want to reorient yourself – Vinster provides overview, support and direction.

hero.title: Discover your preferences, find your career
hero.subtitle: Dive deep into yourself and let AI find the perfect career match for you

what_is_vinster.title: What is Vinster?
what_is_vinster.description: Vinster is an AI-driven platform that helps you discover what work truly suits you. Through targeted questions and smart analysis, we create a personal profile that gives you clarity about your career direction.
what_is_vinster.based_on: Built on proven methods from practice and your unique characteristics, you get:
what_is_vinster.two_matching_functions: Two matching functions that fit you perfectly
what_is_vinster.one_surprising_suggestion: One surprising suggestion that opens new possibilities
what_is_vinster.clear_action_plan: A clear action plan to realize your desired career
what_is_vinster.no_tests: No boring tests, but real questions that make you think.

what_do_you_get.title: What do you get?
what_do_you_get.subtitle: A complete package to shape your career:
what_do_you_get.insight_interests: Deep insight into your motivations and work preferences
what_do_you_get.research_plan: A research plan to explore further
what_do_you_get.search_profile: A search profile for recruiters and networks

card1.title: What is Vinster?
card1.description: Vinster is an AI-driven platform that helps you discover what work truly suits you. Through targeted questions and smart analysis, we create a personal profile that gives you clarity about your career direction.

card2.title: What do you get?
card2.description: A comprehensive personality report, a customized search profile, and concrete steps to realize your desired career. All built on proven methods from practice and your unique characteristics.

step1.title: Explore your preferences
step1.description: Answer questions about what truly motivates you

step2.title: Discover your goals
step2.description: Define your ideal work environment and objectives

step3.title: Get your report
step3.description: Receive a personal AI report with recommendations

process_steps.subtitle: The Process
process_steps.title: How it works
process_steps.step3_desc: Determine what matters most to you
process_steps.step4_desc: Complete your profile and receive your report

data_safety.title: Privacy guaranteed
data_safety.description: Your data is stored securely according to the strictest privacy standards. We never share your personal information with third parties.

flexible_journey.title: Flexible process
flexible_journey.description: Start where you want, stop when you want. You can always return to complete or update your profile.

flexible.title: Flexible process
flexible.description: Start where you want, stop when you want

landing.testimonial: Thanks to Vinster, I finally got clarity about my career path. The report was surprisingly accurate and helped me make the right choices.

banner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and optimize our website. You can adjust your preferences below.

necessary.title: Necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly.

statistics.title: Statistics cookies
statistics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used for advertising and marketing purposes.

what_are_cookies.title: What are cookies?
what_are_cookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us make the website function and improve your experience.

necessary.description: These cookies are essential for our website to function:
necessary.session: Session cookies for login and navigation
necessary.preferences: Preference cookies for language and settings

statistics.description: These cookies help us improve our website:

marketing.description: These cookies are used for marketing:

retention.title: How long do we keep cookies?
retention.description: Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser. Persistent cookies are kept for a maximum of 2 years, unless you delete them earlier.

manage.title: How can you adjust your preferences?
manage.description: You can always adjust your cookie preferences through the settings on this website.
manage.browser: You can also manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have questions about our cookie policy? Please contact us:
